text: "Temporary Home" is a 2009 song by country artist Carrie Underwood and is the second single from her third studio album Play On. It went to number 41 in the United States and number 65 in Canada. It also went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2011. ==Music video== The music video for "Temporary Home" was directed by Deaton-Flanigen. It premiered on CMT on February 4, 2010. It made history on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for being at number one for consecutive eight weeks. ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Temporary Home
